summary: The module defines a Pythonic wrapper around GDAL/OGR data source objects, exposing their layers, features, fields, geometry and metadata through familiar container interfaces and properties, enabling easy iteration and inspection of vector spatial data.
business_intent: To give Django GIS applications a simple, highâ€‘level way to open and read vector geospatial files (e.g., shapefiles, TIGER/Line) so that spatial data can be incorporated into web mapping, analysis, and storage workflows.
